articles.description: Queen Letizia, 49, visited the Paseo de Sagrera market with her mother-in-law Queen Sofia, 83, and dauighters Princess Leonor, 16, and Princess Sofia, 15.
articles.content:
Queen Letizia of Spain showed that style clearyl runs in the family as she stepped out for an evening shopping trip with her mother-in-law and two teenage daughters. 
The family outing in Palma de M… [+5166 chars]
